Please help me my phycologist abandoned me i have a crippling hentai addiction, i haven't let my house in weeks and i haven't left the sofa on days, i am running low on food and i just ate my last pot noodle, and only have stale bread left, the only comfort i enjoy is being with my waifu body pillow on the sofa, i have run out of money to keep paying my subscription for my hentai streaming service, please send me money to keep paying for my hentai, food and rent.
